title: About
text: Rachel Miller is a Junior Sports Media and Communications and Broadcasting double major at the University of Nebraska - Lincoln. She is planning on going into Sports Administration after college, to manage teams, hopefully a hockey team.

title: An Analysis of the Vancouver Canucks without their Capitann Quinn Hughes
text:
The Vancouver Canucks have seen a lot of injury this season. One of whom being their captain Quinn Hughes. Hughes was named the 15th captain for the Canucks in September 2023, the first defenseman to have a ‘C’ on their sweater since a three-player rotation in the 1990-91 season with Doug Lidster, Trevor Linden and Dan Quinn.
No. 43, Quinn Hughes has been dealing with an Oblique strain, a lower body injury and other unspecified ailments. Due to his injuries through out this season he has missed a number of games including the Four Nations Face-Off Tournament. After sitting out for the rest of their game against the Seattle Kraken, the oldest Hughes brother was back in the lineup to play against the Calgary Flames.
As of their most recent win against the Colorado Avalanche, April 10, 2025, Hughes is up to 74 points, 16 goals with 58 assists, in only 65 games.


Code
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(ggalt)

hockey25 <- read_csv("data/hockeylogs2025.csv")

teamstats <- read_csv("data/Vancouver Canucks Data - Sheet1.csv")

name_pts <- teamstats |> 
  select(Name, PTS, GP)

nhl <- read_csv("data/NHL Summary - Sheet1.csv")

name_pts |> 
  gt() |> 
  cols_label(
    GP = "Games Played", 
    PTS = "Points"
  ) |> 
  tab_header(
    title = "Who has the most points on the team in the games they have played? ", 
    subtitle = "IDK Yet"
  ) |> tab_style(
    style = cell_text(color = "black",weight = "bold", align = "left"),
    locations = cells_title("title")
  ) |> tab_style(
    style = cell_text(color = "black", align = "left"),  locations = cells_title("subtitle")
  ) |> 
  tab_source_note( 
    source_note = md("**By:**Rachel Miller | **Source:** NHL: Vancouver Canucks Team Stats" )
  ) |> 
  tab_style(
    locations = cells_column_labels(columns = everything()),
    style = list(
      cell_borders(sides = "bottom", weight = px(3)),
      cell_text(weight = "bold", size = 12)
    )
  ) |> 
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_fill(color = "#00205B"), 
      cell_text(color = "white")
    ), 
    locations = cells_body(
      rows = Name == "Q. Hughes D"
    )
  )

By:Rachel Miller | Source: NHL: Vancouver Canucks Team Stats








THIS CHART DOES NOT REFLECT CURRENT STATS*
Quinn Hughes has 70 points in 61 games played, the next highest point scorer has 46 points in 68 games. Hughes has played seven less games than Brock Boeser but has 24 more points than him.


Code
stepwins <- hockey25 |> 
  mutate(Win = case_when(rslt == "W" ~ 1, rslt == "L" ~ 0)) |> 
  group_by(team_name) |> 
  arrange(date) |> 
  mutate(cumulative_wins = cumsum(Win)) |> 
  ungroup()

vcstep <- stepwins |> filter(team_name == "Vancouver Canucks")


wjstep <- stepwins |> filter(team_name == "Winnipeg Jets")

dates <- vcstep |> 
  filter(
    date == as.Date("2024-12-28") |
    date == as.Date("2024-12-31") |
    date == as.Date("2025-01-02") |
    date == as.Date("2025-01-03") |
    date == as.Date("2025-02-02") |
    date == as.Date("2025-02-04") |
    date == as.Date("2025-02-06") |
    date == as.Date("2025-02-08") |
    date == as.Date("2025-02-22") |
    date == as.Date("2025-02-23") |
    date == as.Date("2025-03-05") |
    date == as.Date("2025-03-07") |
    date == as.Date("2025-03-09") |
    date == as.Date("2025-03-11")
    )



ggplot() + 
  geom_step(data = stepwins, aes(x=date, y=cumulative_wins, group = team_name), color="grey") +
  geom_step(data = vcstep, aes(x=date, y=cumulative_wins), color="#041C2C") + 
  geom_point(data = dates, aes(x=date, y=cumulative_wins), color="#00205B") + 
  geom_step(data = wjstep, aes(x=date, y=cumulative_wins), color="#AC162C") + 
  annotate("text", x=(as.Date("2025-04-05")), y=35, label="Vancouver Canucks") +
  annotate("text", x=(as.Date("2025-04-10")), y=50, label="Winnipeg Jets") +
  labs(title="Do the Canucks lose more when Quinn Hughes is not in the game?", subtitle="Or are they just having a rough season?", caption = "Source: Hockey Scrapper | By: Rachel Miller") + 
  theme_minimal()









The Canucks are having a rough season right now, it was announced after the San Jose Sharks lost to Minnesota Wild, 4-09-2025, that the Canucks are officially out of the running for a playoff spot. Right after their come back win against the Dallas Stars Tuesday the eighth. Vancouver was down 5-2 late in the third period when they scored their three goals to tie it up with less than a minute in the third.


Code
vk <- nhl |> filter(Player == "Nikita Kucherov") 
nk <- nhl |> filter(Player == "Nathan MacKinnon")
qh <- nhl |> filter(Player == "Quinn Hughes")
bb <- nhl |> filter(Player == "Brock Boeser")





ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = nhl, aes(x=GP, y=PTS), color= "lightgrey") + 
   geom_point(data=vk, aes(x=GP, y=PTS), color="#002868") +
   geom_point(data=nk, aes(x=GP, y=PTS), color="#6F263D") +
   geom_point(data=qh, aes(x=GP, y=PTS), color="#00843D") +
   geom_point(data=bb, aes(x=GP, y=PTS), color="#00843D") +
  geom_text(data = vk, aes(x=74-.5, y=116+7, label = Player)) +
  geom_text(data = nk, aes(x=79-4, y=116-11, label = Player)) +
  geom_text(data = qh, aes(x=64-.5, y=74+7, label = Player)) +
  geom_text(data = bb, aes(x=71-.5, y=49+7, label = Player)) +
  labs(title = "Who steps up in goal scoring when Quinn Hughes is not in the game?", subtitle = "Brock Boeser might step up, but Quinn Hughes is still leading the team in points", x="Games Played", y="Points", caption = "Source:Hockey Reference | By: Rachel Miller") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 14, face="bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 8), 
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10), 
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )
